title: Permanently switch to text-only “Forge AI” branding and remove icon mark everywhere

requirements.text: Remove the Forge icon mark from all user-visible UI surfaces and enforce a permanent text-only brand presentation that displays exactly “Forge AI” everywhere branding appears (header, homepage hero branding, any other brand lockups, and any loading/empty states that currently show a logo).

quotes: 2. Text only is correct Forge AI

acceptanceCriteria: No pages render the icon mark image in any header/footer/hero branding area; branding is represented as text-only “Forge AI”.
All visible brand text uses exactly the string “Forge AI” (including casing and spacing).
No UI surface regresses to icon+text lockups when navigating between routes.

requirements.text: Update the reusable branding component(s) so that the default and only supported brand rendering is text-only (no icon usage), and update existing callers to stop requesting or relying on icon-based variants (e.g., remove usage patterns like variant="icon-text").

quotes: Text only is correct Forge AI

acceptanceCriteria: The component currently defined in frontend/src/components/ForgeBrandMark.tsx does not render an tag for the brand icon.
Global header branding (frontend/src/components/GlobalHeader.tsx) renders text-only branding while preserving existing link behavior and focus/keyboard accessibility.

Homepage hero branding areas that currently import/use ForgeBrandMark (e.g., frontend/src/pages/ForgeHomePage.tsx and frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx) render text-only branding without layout breakage.

requirements.text: Remove the Forge icon mark from the site chrome metadata where it is currently used as a favicon, so the app no longer references the Forge icon asset for the browser tab icon.

quotes: get rid of the logo all together

acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html no longer references /assets/generated/forge-icon-v2.dim_256x256.png as the favicon.
After change, the app builds without broken asset references to the removed favicon path.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any frontend.immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the backend as single-actor architecture; no backend changes are required for this branding-only request.
nonGoals: Do not introduce a new icon/logo mark or replacement graphic.
Do not change authentication behavior, routing, or marketplace/demo functionality beyond what is necessary to remove icon branding.
Do not redesign the overall theme; this request is limited to removing the icon mark and enforcing text-only “Forge AI” branding.
